about_the_game:
Dark Farm: Ragnarok's Eve

In the twilight of Norse mythology, as Ragnarok looms, you are a farmer thrust into chaos. The gods' quarrels have destroyed your home and gravely injured your sister. Now, you embark on a perilous journey to heal her and seek vengeance against the divine.

Key Features:

- Unforgiving Hardcore Gameplay
Explore a world of constant peril, where every decision balances risk and reward. Death lurks in the smallest mistakes, bringing severe consequences. Tread carefully, for survival is paramount.

- Intense Combat Focus
Immerse yourself in visceral battles. Use your senses as in the real world to set goals, track, and aim against numerous challenges. Master a diverse arsenal, each weapon with unique patterns. Target specific body parts for tactical advantage. Your combat prowess will determine your fate.

- Diverse Skills
Harness powerful but challenging abilities. Skills require dedication to master, involving long incantations, special techniques, and tactical insight. Your quick thinking in applying the right skill at the right moment can turn the tide of battle.

- Dynamic Item Acquisition
Utilize the auction house to obtain crucial equipment. Successful explorers can reap rewards from their dangerous adventures, while newcomers can prepare for the trials ahead. Your strategic use of the marketplace could be the key to survival and prosperity.

- Escape the Perilous Realm
Discover hidden portals to delve deeper underground, facing terrifying monsters and uncovering precious artifacts. Remember, your treasures mean nothing if you can't make it out alive. Find the rare exits before the dark hordes claim your soul.

Prepare for a brutal, thrilling battle royale experience in a world where Norse gods and monsters reign. Will you survive the coming Ragnarok?

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It contains General Mature Content, and may include Nudity or Sexual Content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
